name: (Iwr) 1. Speaking - Workplace & College Rules
questionContents: Do you have any of the rules in your workplace or college?
Do you think they are good rules or bad rules? Why?
If you could change one rule at your workplace or college, what would it be and why?

name: (Iwr) 2. Vocabulary: IT & Security Terms
questionContents: Person in charge of IT
Keeping something safe
Information such as numbers and details about people
A secret word that you type into a computer before you can use it
A group of connected computers
Having only letters and numbers
Letters, numbers, punctuation marks, etc.
People you work with

name: (Iwr) 3. Speaking: Workplace IT Rules
questionContents: What rules would you set for installing new software?
Should employees be allowed to connect personal devices to company computers? Why or why not?
Is playing computer games at work acceptable? Under what conditions?
What are the advantages and disadvantages of using social networking sites such as Facebook at work?
Should employees be allowed to use mobile phones during work hours? Explain your reasoning.
Why might it be important to switch off your computer at night?
What risks are associated with downloading files at work?
Should streaming music or video be permitted in a professional environment? Why or why not?

name: (Iwr) 4. Speaking: Technology-related Rules
questionContents: What technology-related rules exist in your workplace or place of study?
Do you think these rules are helpful? Why or why not?
Which rule do you find most difficult to follow? Explain why.
If you could change one technology-related rule, what would it be?
How do these rules affect productivity and security in your environment?
